rows.label: tev000401_MSG0001
rows.name: Let's see... What mission requires my talents now?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000401_MSG0002
rows.name: Hm? Who are you, and why are you speaking to me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000401_MSG0003
rows.name:
You have gumption, I'll give you that. For I rank
among the elite-est of the elite, and few possess the
temerity to address a BLADE of my stature.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000401_MSG1001
rows.name:
I can only assume that you're engaged in a mission
that requires assistance from a BLADE of my caliber,
and have turned to me in a desperate plea for aid.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000401_MSG1002
rows.name:
I should be outraged, but your brazenness intrigues me.
You would have me accompany you, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000401_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev000401_SEL0011
rows.name: Add H.B. to your team.

rows.label: tev000401_JNK0020
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev000401_SEL0021
rows.name: Decline H.B.'s offer for now.

rows.label: tev000401_MSG1003
rows.name:
Then let us be off! I am sure you are eager to witness
my elite talents firsthand, and I would hate to keep
you in suspense.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000401_MSG1004
rows.name:
...I'm sorry? Did you just decline my assistance?
Who exactly do you think you are?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000401_MSG1009
rows.name:
You're the one investigating the potential Lifehold site,
are you not?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000401_MSG1010
rows.name:
Now THAT is a mission worthy of my talents!
You need only to ask, and they shall be yours.
...Er, you ARE going to ask, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000401_JNK0030
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev000401_SEL0031
rows.name: Add H.B. to your team.

rows.label: tev000401_JNK0040
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev000401_SEL0041
rows.name: Decline H.B.'s request for now.

rows.label: tev000401_MSG1011
rows.name:
Then a successful outcome is all but assured!
But do refrain from celebrating our victory until
the job is done—it's considered poor form.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000401_MSG1012
rows.name:
...I'm sorry? Did you just decline my assistance?
Who exactly do you think you are?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000401_MSG1017
rows.name:
With my talents on your team, the likes of the Ganglion
are hardly a threat at all. Mere puppies, in fact.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000401_MSG1018
rows.name:
Let us depart for Oblivia together, so that I may ensure
your mission ends as a rousing success.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000401_JNK0050
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev000401_SEL0051
rows.name: Add H.B. to your team.

rows.label: tev000401_JNK0060
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev000401_SEL0061
rows.name: Decline H.B.'s request for now.

rows.label: tev000401_MSG1019
rows.name: Let the Ganglion taste the might of the elite-est elites![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000401_MSG1020
rows.name:
...I'm sorry? Did you just decline my assistance?
Who exactly do you think you are?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000401_MSG1025
rows.name:
It appears that your team has already been assigned
for this mission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000401_MSG1026
rows.name:
Just try not to embarrass yourself out there.
As my rival, I have certain expectations of you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000401_MSG1031
rows.name:
An entire army of Ganglion? Is that supposed to
frighten me? Well, it does not! For there is no life that
Hector Birtwhistle cannot save.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000401_MSG1032
rows.name: I trust you'll want me to accompany you to Oblivia?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000401_JNK0070
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev000401_SEL0071
rows.name: Add H.B. to your team.

rows.label: tev000401_JNK0080
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev000401_SEL0081
rows.name: Decline H.B.'s request for now.

rows.label: tev000401_MSG1033
rows.name: Let the Ganglion taste the might of the elite-est elites![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000401_MSG1034
rows.name:
...I'm sorry? Did you just decline my assistance?
Who exactly do you think you are?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000401_MSG1039
rows.name:
Sylvalum is home to many of the Ganglion's most
elite warriors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000401_MSG1040
rows.name:
I certainly hope you aren't considering doing something
foolish, such as going there without me to protect you.
No, that will not do. You must take me along![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000401_JNK0090
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev000401_SEL0091
rows.name: Add H.B. to your team.

rows.label: tev000401_JNK0100
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev000401_SEL0101
rows.name: Decline H.B.'s request for now.

rows.label: tev000401_MSG1041
rows.name: Let the Ganglion taste the might of the elite-est elites![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000401_MSG1042
rows.name:
...I'm sorry? Did you just decline my assistance?
Who exactly do you think you are?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000401_MSG1047
rows.name:
A data probe is in need of repair? That sounds like a
job for an elite Pathfinder such as myself![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000401_MSG1048
rows.name:
Wisely accept my assistance, and your mission is all
but guaranteed to end in a flawless triumph. Confetti!
Parades! All of this can be yours![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000401_JNK0110
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev000401_SEL0111
rows.name: Add H.B. to your team.

rows.label: tev000401_JNK0120
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev000401_SEL0121
rows.name: Decline H.B.'s request for now.

rows.label: tev000401_MSG1049
rows.name:
Then we shall journey together until the day the
Lifehold Core is found. Excelsior![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000401_MSG1050
rows.name:
...I'm sorry? Did you just decline my assistance?
Who exactly do you think you are?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000401_MSG1051
rows.name:
As a fellow Pathfinder, I have a duty to put a stop to
Lao's transgressions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000401_MSG1052
rows.name: You must take me to Lao![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000401_JNK0130
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev000401_SEL0131
rows.name: Add H.B. to your team.

rows.label: tev000401_JNK0140
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev000401_SEL0141
rows.name: Decline H.B.'s request for now.

rows.label: tev000401_MSG1053
rows.name:
I will make clear to him which of us is the finest man
in all the Pathfinders.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000401_MSG1054
rows.name:
Then it seems I must entrust my duty to you.
Promise me that you will find a way to stop him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000401_MSG1059
rows.name:
And now we come to our last and most important
mission—securing the Lifehold Core.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000401_MSG1060
rows.name:
And who better to serve as your co-star in the war's
final act, mmm?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000401_JNK0150
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev000401_SEL0151
rows.name: Add H.B. to your team.

rows.label: tev000401_JNK0160
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev000401_SEL0161
rows.name: Decline H.B.'s request for now.

rows.label: tev000401_MSG1061
rows.name:
Then let us show the rest of BLADE what it means
to be elite![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000401_MSG1062
rows.name:
...I'm sorry? Did you just decline my assistance?
Who exactly do you think you are?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000401_MSG1067
rows.name:
One day, they will build the Hector Birtwhistle Memorial
Center on this vacant land.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000401_MSG1068
rows.name:
And in order to fill its many wings, there are still more
missions I must complete, and more plaudits I must win.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000401_MSG1069
rows.name:
Please, you must take me with you! The more you help
me achieve, the more likely you'll be honored with a
plaque. Or perhaps a small statue near the restrooms.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000401_JNK0170
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev000401_SEL0171
rows.name: Add H.B. to your team.

rows.label: tev000401_JNK0180
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev000401_SEL0181
rows.name: Decline H.B.'s request for now.

rows.label: tev000401_MSG1070
rows.name:
Entrust to me whatever duties you wish.
There is no problem that I cannot solve.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000401_MSG1071
rows.name:
...I'm sorry? Did you just decline my assistance?
Who exactly do you think you are?[ST:wait ]
